alert.note: Alert for St Lawrence Island and Bering Strait Coast (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 25 at 4:00AM AKST until January 25 at 3:00PM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 PM AKST THIS AFTERNOON... ...WINTER STORM WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM THURSDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH LATE THURSDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...For the Winter Weather Advisory on the Bering Strait Coast, blowing snow. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. For the Winter Storm Watch for St Lawrence Island, blizzard conditions possible. Total snow accumulations of up to two inches possible. Winds could gust as high as 55 mph. * WHERE...St Lawrence Island and Bering Strait Coast. * WHEN...For the Winter Weather Advisory, until 3 PM AKST this afternoon. For the Winter Storm Watch, from Thursday afternoon through late Thursday night. * IMPACTS...Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Wind chills as low as 35 below zero could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes.
info.instruction: Use caution while traveling, especially in open areas. A Winter Storm Watch for blizzard conditions means there is a potential for falling and/or blowing snow with strong winds and extremely poor visibilities. This can lead to whiteout conditions and make travel very difficult.

area.areaDesc: St Lawrence Island and Bering Strait Coast
